name: Resurrection Quest
description:
A platformer where you die to progress.  When you die, you respawn at the nearest statue to your point of death. 

Each time you run out of lives you'll be taken to the shop where you can buy more lives (using the coins you've collected) for your future attempts.

A/D is left/right movement, space is jump.

Please note this game is a prototype and so some of the movement controls are less than perfect. There are currently 3 implemented levels.
